metadata.name: Intro
metadata.value:
We are OMP, a game changer that optimizes supply chains of the world’s leading companies with our very own smart software and services.  

Are you an experienced SQL Server database administrator? Are you eager to join a team that forms an essential part of OMP’s solution? And can you handle large data volumes coming from over 150 instances at leading supply chain companies and an increasing number of cloud deployments?

Then you could be our new Database Administrator. Read on!

metadata.name: Profile
metadata.value:
A bachelor’s or master’s degree in Information Technology or a similar field.
Strong motivation to learn new technologies (NoSQL databases)
Solid experience in writing complex SQL statements and database-stored procedures.
Experience in developing tools in T-SQL.
Experience in installing and maintaining customer-hosted SQL servers and managing Azure SQL Database services.

metadata.name: Bonus Points (Profile)
metadata.value:
Experience writing PowerShell.
Knowledge of alternative, non relational database systems.

metadata.name: Hard Skills
metadata.value:
T-SQL, SQL statements & database-stored procedures
Azure SQL database services
Customer-hosted SQL servers
PowerShell scripting

metadata.name: Your Future
metadata.value: At OMP, we’re eager to find your best career fit. Our talent management program supports your personal development and empowers you to build a career in line with your ambitions.

metadata.name: Your Team
metadata.value: As our new Database Administrator, you’ll be part of the Tools and Database team which, in turn, fits into the bigger picture of the Technical Services team. Technical Services equips our teams with the necessary technology, applications, and technical framework for them to do their jobs effectively and securely.

metadata.name: SEO description
metadata.value: Are you an experienced SQL Server database administrator? Are you eager to join a team that forms an essential part of OMP’s solution? Join OMP!

metadata.name: OGTitle
metadata.value: Join OMP BE as a Database Administrator

title: SQL Database Administrator
content:
As a SQL Database Administrator, you are the go-to person for all database-related challenges within OMP.
You are responsible for:

Staying up to date with the latest developments in database technology and integrating them into our products.
Developing tools to monitor and ensure fluent operations of customer and internal databases.
Ensuring smooth and solid system performance on our fast-growing Azure cloud.
Assisting our consultants and developers in writing efficient SQL statements.

questions.label: Do you need a work permit?
How many years of experience do you have?
